Olivine data from Lucey, JGR-E, E1, 1703-1714, 1998
To calculate the real index use Eqn 8c, Lucey 1998

n_olv=1.827-[0.192 * Mg#], Mg # 0-1.0

to calculate the imaginary index, use columns 2 and 3 below

k_olv(lambda) = col 2 + [Mg# * col 3], data valid for Mg # 0. to 1.0

col 1 are wavelengths in micrometers
	col 1		col 2		col 3
